subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Mahiedine Mekhissi-Benabbad of France was disqualified after winning his third straight European Championship 3,000-meter steeplechase in Zurich for taking off his shirt and bib for the last 100 meters of the race.
snippet: Mahiedine Mekhissi-Benabbad of France was disqualified after winning his third straight European Championship 3,000-meter steeplechase in Zurich for taking off his shirt and bib for the last 100 meters of the race.
